titles.title: Recognizing the importance of beauty and wellness educators to the United States and supporting the designation of March 30, 2023, as "National Beauty and Wellness Education Appreciation Day".
Recognizing the importance of beauty and wellness educators to the United States and supporting the designation of March 30, 2023, as "National Beauty and Wellness Education Appreciation Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of National Beauty and Wellness Education Appreciation Day.
